persona.name: Aiden Johnson

occupation.title: Marketing Specialist
occupation.description: You work as a marketing specialist at a local agency, where you develop and implement marketing strategies for small businesses. Your role involves conducting market research, creating promotional materials, and managing social media accounts. You enjoy the creativity involved in your work but often feel the pressure of tight deadlines and client expectations.

persona.education: Georgia State University, Bachelor's in Business Administration. Focused on Marketing and Management. Completed an internship at a local marketing firm.

To advance in my career and achieve a managerial position.
To save enough for my children's education and family vacations.
To become more involved in community service and local sports programs.
